variables.feature_description: Implement a comprehensive database seeding system for EduTrack application with realistic test data for Students, Teachers, Courses, and Attendance records.
variables.problem_statement: Currently, the application lacks a robust seeding mechanism to populate the database with realistic test data for development and testing purposes.
variables.proposed_solution:
Create a sophisticated seeding system with:
- Realistic data generation using Bogus library
- Configurable seed data quantities
- Relationship integrity maintenance
- Environment-specific seeding
- Performance optimized bulk operations
variables.alternative_solutions:
- Manual data entry
- Simple static seed data
- External data import tools
variables.technical_requirements:
- Entity Framework Core migrations
- Bogus library for fake data generation
- Configuration-based seed control
- Transaction management for data integrity
- Logging for seed operations
variables.affected_components:
- EduTrack.Infrastructure project
- Database migration system
- Application startup configuration
- Test data generation
variables.criteria_1: Generate realistic student data with proper relationships
variables.criteria_3: Maintain referential integrity across all entities
variables.additional_context: This feature is essential for Phase 2 development and will support both development testing and demo scenarios.
